articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Pukchang Thermal Power Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Pukchang Thermal Power Complex
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, made a field survey of the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex.
					 Going round various places of the complex, he encouraged the workers bringing about a surge in production.
					
					 A consultative meeting held on spot stressed the need to meticulously carry out equipment and technical management and took measures for relevant units to ensure the timely supply of raw and other materials needed for production.
					
					 The premier also went round the Sungri Motor Complex and the Hyongbong Coal Mine and the Sochang Youth Coal Mine of the Tokchon Area Coal-Mining Complex, where he discussed the issues arising in expanding the existent production capacity and producing coal.

articles.title: 2017 Autumn Table-Tennis Tournament for Disabled Persons and Amateurs Held
articles.content:
2017 Autumn Table-Tennis Tournament for Disabled Persons and Amateurs Held
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The 2017 Autumn Table-Tennis Tournament for Disabled Persons and Amateurs took place at the Gymnasium of Kim Il Sung University from Oct. 16 to 22.
					 Among the audience were Chairman Kim Mun Chol and officials of the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled, disabled persons and armatures, citizens, youth and students, staff members of the European Union Programme Support here and overseas Koreans.

articles.title: DPRK Order Awarded to Beninese Personage
articles.content:
DPRK Order Awarded to Beninese Personage
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Order of the DPRK Friendship 2nd Class was awarded to Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					 The DPRK ambassador to Benin handed over the order and certificate to Hessou Kohovi on October 14.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Confrontational Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Confrontational Policy
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Voices denouncing the south Korean authorities' "policy toward the north", being pursuant to the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK are getting louder in south Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article, citing facts.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The "policy toward the north" touted by the south Korean authorities is the one of destroying the inter-Korean relations from A to Z as it is a product of sinister ambition to stifle the compatriots in the north in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 The present puppet ruling forces are taking the positive advantage of the U.S. sanctions and pressure against the north while asserting that the Trump administration's policy toward the DPRK characterized by "maximum pressure and engagement" is in good harmony with their "policy toward the north".
					
					 "Simultaneously pushing ahead sanctions and pressure and dialogue" touted by them is just extremely contradictory and absurd sophism.   
					
					 Their talking about "dialogue" while following the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and positively joining in the moves to slap sanctions and pressure against the latter is an impudent act of deceiving the public opinion in a bid to cover up their confrontational nature and attitude servile to the U.S. and justify the moves to ignite a nuclear war against the north.
					
					 In fact, the puppet authorities, crying out that the "north's access to nuclear weapons can never be allowed", are desperately cooperating in the U.S. moves to ignite a nuclear war against the north. 
					
					 Servitude to the U.S., sanctions and pressure can never go together with the improved inter-Korean relations and dialogue.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities go reckless, while dancing to the tune of their master U.S. and the conservative group, they will invite horrible disaster, far from the improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 They should draw a due lesson from the collapse of the inter-Korean relations caused by the anachronistic "policy toward the north" and take the road of making a switchover in their policy. This is the demand of the people from all walks of life in south Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Wild Assertion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Wild Assertion
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean chief executive met with the "diplomatic group of parliamentarians" which visited the U.S., where he asserted that "it is necessary to agree with" the U.S. measures to put pressure upon the north including the deployment of nuclear strategic bomber B-1B on the Korean peninsula in a bid to stop someone's "provocation".
					 Meanwhile, puppet Defense Minister Song Yong Mu went to the U.S. nuclear strategic submarine Michigan, where he asserted the need to "show the might of south Korea-U.S. cooperation".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary ridicules the puppet forces' assertion as the rash act of colonial servants who goes reckless to escalate confrontation with compatriots in the north, backed by their master U.S.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive's assertion goes to reveal for himself the treacherous nature of blindly following his master's moves to ignite a nuclear war against the north, in utter disregard of the destiny of the nation, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 His assertion brought to light his sinister intention as his master's servant for a war against the north. 
					
					 The puppet forces go reckless, backed by their master, not clearly understanding the DPRK's strategic position and the trend of the times. This is the outrageous act of idiots who precipitate their self-destruction by acting as shield and cannon-fodder of the U.S.

articles.title: Japan Will Only Face Terrible Doom: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan Will Only Face Terrible Doom: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) --At the recent talks with the foreign minister of Denmark, Japanese Foreign Minister Kono let loose a string of rubbish that "it is important for the whole international community to step up pressure upon the DPRK so as to get it change its policy." Earlier, he clung to the sleeves of diplomatic officials of UK, Germany, China, Ukraine and other countries to stoke atmosphere of pressure against the DPRK, clamoring about the necessity to put pressure of a fresh stage upon it.
					 It is ridiculous for Japan, no more than a stooge, to trumpet about maximum pressure, poking its nose, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary.
					
					 The intention sought by the Japanese authorities in letting loose a torrent of rubbish over pressure upon the DPRK is to iron out their worst ruling crisis by inflaming the tense situation on the Korean peninsula to the extremes, says the commentary, adding:
					
					 Now the economic policy of the Japanese authorities has faced doom.
					
					 The ruling forces are scrambling to evade the crisis of rule by diverting the attention of the people to the story of "threat from the DPRK" which they hyped up.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are also seeking to realize their goal of militarization and ambition for reinvasion by abusing the increasing tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They are organizing the evacuation drill in their country in order to stoke hostility towards the DPRK. They are endlessly conducting all sorts of war drills in waters close to the Korean peninsula together with the U.S.
					
					 If Japan, a parasite living under the wing of the U.S., dares keep on rash acts to make a showdown with the DPRK, the former will only face bitter doom.

articles.title: Sexual Crimes on Increase in S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Sexual Crimes on Increase in S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Sexual crimes are on increase in the puppet army, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 According to data of the puppet Defense Ministry, the sexual crimes reached more than 870 last year from over 470 in 2013.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth and Students Denounce U.S. and Authorities' Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth and Students Denounce U.S. and Authorities' Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Eleven youth and students organizations of south Korea including the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century and the Seoul Youth Network in a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Oct. 19 denounced the U.S.-south Korea combined naval drill and the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and Trump's planned visit to south Korea, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 The press release termed the U.S.-south Korea combined naval drill with strategic weapons for preemptive attack involved a declaration of a war.
					
					 It called for withdrawing unilateral "policy hostile to the north" such as military pressure and economic sanctions on the north.
					
					 It noted that youth and students will take the lead in the struggle against Trump's planned visit which will incite a war and force south Korea to import war weapons.

articles.title: Youth Unemployment Rate on Increase in S. Korea
articles.content:
Youth Unemployment Rate on Increase in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Youth unemployment problem is getting serious in south Korea, according to the south Korean MBC on Oct. 19.
					 The unemployment rate among youth up to age 29 has shown much increase in September, hitting a record high since 2015, according to data released by the puppet Statistics Agency.

articles.title: Trump's Planned Visit to S. Korea Opposed
articles.content:
Trump's Planned Visit to S. Korea Opposed
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on Oct. 19 opposing south Korean visit by war lunatic Trump and demanding the release of prisoners of conscience, according to Jaju Sibo, south Korean internet newspaper.
					 The speakers denounced the U.S.-south Korea combined naval drill in the East Sea and South Sea of Korea with U.S. nuclear carrier and nuclear submarines involved as an act to ignite a nuclear war, not just military exercises.
					
					 They called for conducting a campaign against south Korean visit by Trump, stressing the need to stop the visit by the war merchant of a dirty country fanning up a war on the Korean peninsula and selling its weapons.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Lithocopy Publishing House of Venezuela published in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" on the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd founding anniversary.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). And it indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Austria
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK posted on its internet homepage leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is a Juche-Type Revolutionary Party Which Inherited the Glorious Tradition of the DIU" on the 91st anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The work published on Oct. 17, Juche 71 (1982) clarifies that the Workers' Party of Korea is the revolutionary party that paved a fresh road of its development and the Juche-type revolutionary party which conducts activities independently and creatively, guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 It deals with the position and role of the party in accomplishing the socialist cause.

articles.title: DIU Anniversary Marked by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
DIU Anniversary Marked by Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Oct. 15 on the 91st anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 October 17 this year is the 91st anniversary of the DIU formed by the great Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The DIU is the first Juche-type revolutionary organization in Korea.
					
					 The DIU raised it as its immediate task to defeat Japanese imperialism and achieve the liberation and independence of Korea and as its ultimate goal to build socialism and communism in Korea and, furthermore, destroy all imperialism and build communism in the world.
					
					 The formation of DIU was the historic declaration of the new start of the Korean revolution and the declaration of the decisive fight against Japanese imperialism.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) has been based on the DIU.
					
					 The WPK is now successfully carrying forward the programme set forth by the DIU.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre el Complejo Termoelectrico de Pukchang
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre el Complejo Termoelectrico de Pukchang
Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y premier del Consejo de Ministros, averiguo en el terreno las gestiones del Complejo Termoelectrico de Pukchang.
					  En su recorrido por varios puntos, estimulo a los obreros que registran auge productivo.
					
					  En la reunion de consulta convocada en el terreno, se tomaron las medidas para mejorar el mantenimiento de equipos y la administracion tecnica y cumplir la tarea de las unidades relacionadas de suministrar a tiempo las materias primas y materiales necesarios a la produccion.
					
					  Por otra parte, el premier visito el Complejo Automovilistico Sungri, la mina hullera de Hyongbong y la juventud de Sochang del Complejo Carbonifero de la Region de Tokchon donde discutio los problemas surgidos en la obra de ampliacion de la actual capacidad productiva y la produccion del combustible fosil.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica politica conflictiva de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica politica conflictiva de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual divulgado hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela con datos que ultimamente, se alzan en el suelo surcoreano las voces de condena a la "politica sobre el Norte (de Corea)" de las autoridades actuales que toman parte activa en la campana de EE.UU. para atropellar a la RPDC.
					Esa "politica" destruye las relaciones intercoreanas porque es un producto de la malsana intencion de ellas de aplastar a la parte connacional en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, destaca el articulista y prosigue:
					
					Complacidos de que la "politica" sobre el Norte de la administracion Trump, conocida como "maxima presion y compromiso", concordara con la suya, los gobernantes surcoreanos se adhieren a la campana de sancion y presion anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					La teoria de ellos de "impulsar la sancion y presion al paralelo del dialogo" es un sofisma contradictorio y absurdo.
					
					Al enganar a la opinion publica con ese embuste, quieren disimular su atributo conflictivo y actitud servil a EE.UU. y justificar sus tentativas de guerra nuclear anti-Norte.
					
					En realidad, se hacen complices de EE.UU. en ese designio insistiendo en "no tolerar nunca la posesion de arma nuclear por el Norte".
					
					Son incompatibles la sumision proyanqui y el mejoramiento de vinculos intercoreanos. Y sucede lo mismo en el caso de la sancion y presion con el dialogo.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas siguen portandose como ahora para caerles bien a su amo gringo y las fuerzas conservadoras, se buscaran tremendos desastres, lejos del mejoramiento de relaciones N-S.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores demandan que aquellas cambien la anacronica "politica sobre el Norte" aprendiendo la leccion de la ruptura de relaciones N-S, causada por ella.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta nuevos discursos nocivos de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta nuevos discursos nocivos de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- En el reciente encuentro con la "mision diplomatica de parlamentarios" que habia visitado a EE.UU., el mandatario surcoreano dijo que para prevenir la "provocacion" de alguien, es "necesario dar consentimiento" a las medidas de "presion al Norte" de EE.UU. tales como el despliegue de B-1B en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					Por otra parte, el ministro de Defensa surcoreano Song Yong Mu visito el submarino estrategico nuclear Michigan y pronuncio el disparate de que "se debe mostrar el poder de la cooperacion" Sudcorea-EE.UU.
					
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo el dia 22 un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Tales discursos son otro testimonio de la imprudencia de esos lacayos coloniales que se dedican al enfrentamiento fratricida con la ayuda de su patron gringo.
					
					Las palabras arriba citadas del mandatario surcoreano demuestran la naturaleza antinacional de las autoridades que sin tomar en consideracion el destino nacional, se suman a ciegas a la campana de EE.UU. para desatar la guerra nuclear anti-Norte.
					
					La temeridad de los titeres surcoreanos, impotentes de ver correctamente la posicion estrategica de la RPDC ni la corriente de epoca actual, es una conducta de los idiotas que traen la autodestruccion ofreciendose como carne de canon para el imperialismo yanqui.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta acto verbal de Kono contra la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta acto verbal de Kono contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- En la reciente charla con su homologo danes, el canciller japones Kono dijo que "es importante que toda la sociedad internacional refuerce la presion sobre el Norte de Corea para que este cambie su politica".
					 Anteriormente, destaco la necesidad de ejercer la presion de nueva etapa durante los encuentros con los jefes de diplomacia de Gran Bretana, Alemania, China, Ucrania y otros paises.
					
					  Es muy ridiculo tal comportamiento de Japon que no pasa de ser una marioneta, ridiculiza el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de hoy.
					
					  Las autoridades japonesas reclaman la escalada de presion anti-RPDC con el objetivo de agravar al extremo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, precisa el comentarista y continua:
					
					  Es decir, al circular el rumor de la "amenaza proveniente de la RPDC", quieren salir de la peor crisis de gobernacion y distraer la atencion del pueblo centrada ahora en la politica economica de las autoridades que se halla a punto de fracaso.
					
					  Otro objetivo reside en realizar la militarizacion y la reagresion a ultramar.
					
					  Actualmente, se fomenta en Japon la hostilidad anti-RPDC mediante los ejercicios de evacuacion que tienen lugar en distintas localidades del pais isla.
					
					  Se libran continuamente los ejercicios de guerra EE.UU.-Japon en las aguas maritimas cercanas a la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Si Japon, parasito que vive pegado a EE.UU., mantiene su conducta conflictiva con la RPDC, no tendra otro resultado que el arruinamiento propio.
